title: Ignota's SCP-6222 Pixel Fanart

++ [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7089271240250117418?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en Process Video] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6222 SCP-6222]

[[<]]
> **Filename:** 6222.mp4, 6222.png
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7089271240250117418?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en
> **Derivative of:** SCP-6222 by Aftokrator
[[/<]]
-----

I really like this article, lol. It's simple, funny, and just interesting! I originally found this article by literally just searching the word "Anomalocaris" and ended up really liking it. THEN as I was working on this, I made a post about needing new article suggestions and Aftokrator responded. 

Somehow I had not connected the dots that this was written by Aftokrator until that moment.

ALSO I didn't save the animation layer before closing OR exporting the gif, though so I had to convert the video to the gif!!!!!! >:(

UGH!!!!! It's a little messed up but the video looks fine at least ðŸ˜­
+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]

author: IronShears
